name: Falling ninja
description:
Join the ninja with the red bandana, as he drops down into the unknown!

Fall as fast and as far as possible, by clearing your path with bombs, that you can throw with: [E]

Player movement: the standart [AD/ARROW KEYS] story.
Pro tip: do a wall jump with [Space], to slow the ninjas fall! this will prevent him from taking fall damage.

Menu shortkeys: once you die (wich won't be too hard) you will enter a game over screen ( :( ). There, you can either press the displayed buttons with your cursor OR press [Enter] to play again (as the cool kids do it).
(or you press [esc] to exit the game, in the downloadable version (coming soon...), but I don't know why you would want to do that.

Note, that there is an exit button on the html version too. This is, because... I was too lazy to remove it before exporting.

(If you enter full screen, keep in mind, that you may have to click into the game.)

sound: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Phillip_Gross/Virtual_Instruments/Phillip_Gross_Virtual_Instruments_-_03_-_Optimistic_Bits (not my own)
sound effect:http://soundbible.com/1953-Neck-Snap.html (not my own either)

Have fun!

[Created for Brackeys game jam 2020-1]
